channel.title: Code on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Code on A Blog

item.title: Micro
item.description: So it turns out that some people actually have interest in what I (attempted to) build with regards to the microservice trading platform I mentioned a few posts ago.

item.title: Elixir
item.description: All this Gophering around can get boring. That’s not a bad thing, I still consider Go the language with which I am strongest and most comfortable. If I had to use a language at my workplace, Go would be it.

item.title: A trading platform in Go
item.description: I’ve been obsessing over Go lately. I won’t go into it much since pretty much everyone else on the internet has at some point or another. And all of the people I know have probably heard me raving about it. The quality of the language itself remains divisive, but I am going to soldier on and just try and build something.

item.title: Introducing Graviton
item.description: I’d like to introduce Graviton in this post. Its a name I made up for my project mentioned in a previous post. There’s no real point to the name, except that it uses Electron plus Go. So I figured I’d choose a cool physics based name that starts with G.
